name: Shove Ha'Penny
description:
Shove Ha'Penny is a traditional Victorian pub game!

A traditional Victorian Pub Game: Push your pennies up the board and land them between the lines to win!

Play a friend or a computer opponent with a selection of coins to choose from!

Shove Ha'Penny is set in the mysterious world of The Slaughter, where detective Sydney Emerson explores Victorian London in all its decadence and depravity, searching the slums, taverns and abstract dreamscapes for clues, while meeting a host of interesting, insane and eccentrically British characters along the way.
